title: Reddit Marketing Specialist
job_overview:
We’re hiring a Reddit Marketing Specialist to help grow multiple brands through stealth posting and community engagement. You’ll be responsible for managing and posting from multiple Reddit accounts to drive traffic, build trust, and spark discussions across relevant subreddits—without getting flagged or banned.

Requirements:
 • Must provide your own aged, karma-positive Reddit accounts
 • Proven success posting and engaging on Reddit without bans
 • Familiar with AdsPower or similar anti-detect browsers for safe multi-account management
 • Strong understanding of Reddit culture, subreddit rules, and stealth marketing strategies
 • Skilled in writing authentic, native-style content that blends in
 • Experience using VPNs, proxies, and account warming techniques is a plus

Responsibilities:
 • Rotate and manage multiple Reddit accounts
 • Seed discussions, comments, and links subtly to promote various brands
 • Monitor engagement, karma, traffic, and account health
 • Adapt to different brand tones and subreddit cultures

Terms:
 • Remote, flexible hours
 • Pay based on experience, with performance bonuses

To apply, send a quick overview of your Reddit marketing experience, confirm you have Reddit accounts and experience with AdsPower, and include the word “plume” in your message to confirm you’ve read the full post.
